import React, { Component } from 'react'; import classes from './slideshow.module.css'; const Slideshow=()=>{ return(
>
{/*

Pure CSS Slider Autoplay by PaniKaro

Works on Firefox, Chrome, IE and more. Include autoplay, prev/next buttons & bullets. No more JavaScript ever again. 100% clean.

Version 1.0

) } export default Slideshow;
